content: i used to have a lot of time to knit and i often made blankets and other elaborated hand-knits for every baby that popped up in my family and circle of friends but as time went by my knitting time became very limited and also it seems that more and more babies are on their way so i had to come up with something that i could knit in one weekend i have already gifted a bunch of these and mothers seem to love them so i went ahead and wrote down the pattern i hope you enjoy it this pattern is in honor of my first nephew who is going to be born and join us in june **felipe** thank you mary buffoo 1 for the wonderful mods for the flat version 1 http //www ravelry com/people/buffoo
